refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Your active help in developing Rltool is Solicited You can contribute by sending bug reports to the author. Or you can take up one of the following things: (1)Move poles and zeros by dragging the mouse. (2)Highlight closed loop poles on the rootlocus. (3)Implement mouse controls for Bode Plot (magnitude and phase). (4)Interface with Scicos.
